name: Trample
script:
if IsTargetted(matches[4]) then
local limbcheck = matches[2]..""..matches[3]
if affstrack.score[limbcheck] < 100 then
   affstrack.score[limbcheck] = 100
   ak.scoreup(matches[4])
end
end
matches: An alabaster pegasus breaks the ([\w'\-]+) ([\w'\-]+) of ([\w'\-]+)\.

An alabaster pegasus pulverises the ([\w'\-]+) ([\w'\-]+) of ([\w'\-]+)\.
An alabaster pegasus smashes the ([\w'\-]+) ([\w'\-]+) of ([\w'\-]+)\.
